item.title: Irth Capital 聘用前美国驻卡塔尔大使担任总裁兼合作伙伴
item.description: 全球另类资产管理公司 Irth Capital Management 周一表示，前美国驻卡塔尔大使蒂米-戴维斯（Timmy Davis）已加入 Irth Capital Management，担任总裁兼合伙人。【原文：Timmy Davis, the former U.S. ambassador to Qatar, has joined Irth Capital Management as president and partner, the global alternative asset management firm said on Monday.】

item.title: 花旗集团任命高盛和纽约银行的资深人士担任高级财富管理职位，备忘录称
item.description: 根据路透社周一看到的一份备忘录，花旗集团的财富管理部门已经聘请了两名高级管理人员，以加强其投资解决方案业务。【原文：Citigroup's wealth management arm has hired two senior executives to bolster its investment solutions business, according to a memo seen by Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 美联储哈马克仍关注通胀，呼吁谨慎放宽政策
item.description: 克利夫兰联储主席贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）周一表示，美联储在取消限制性货币政策时需要 "非常谨慎"，因为通胀率仍高于央行2%的目标，且持续存在。【原文：The Federal Reserve needs to be "very cautious" in removing restrictive monetary policy with inflation still above the central bank's 2% target and remaining persistent, Cleveland Fed President Beth Hammack said on Monday.】

item.title: 逆转人才流失：美国签证变更后各国政府希望吸引人才
item.description: 包括韩国在内的国家都希望利用美国更严格的移民政策吸引外国科学家和工程师，从而促进本国产业的发展，扭转人才外流的趋势。【原文：Countries including South Korea are aiming to take advantage of tougher U.S. immigration policy to lure foreign scientists and engineers, boosting their domestic industries and reversing an exodus of talent.】

item.title: 即时观点：分析师对 Nvidia 1000 亿美元投资 OpenAI 的反应
item.description: 芯片制造商英伟达（Nvidia）与 ChatGPT 母公司 OpenAI 周一表示，双方将签署战略合作意向书，投资高达 1000 亿美元，部署至少 10 千兆瓦的计算能力。【原文：Chipmaker Nvidia is set to invest up to $100 billion in ChatGPT-parent OpenAI, signing a letter of intent for a strategic partnership to deploy at least 10 gigawatts of compute, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 好时公司打赢了声称里斯万圣节糖果不吓人的官司
item.description: 好时公司打赢了一场官司，这场官司声称好时公司误导了消费者，让他们失望的是，他们购买的万圣节主题里斯花生酱糖果没有标签上显示的装饰细节。【原文：Hershey defeated a lawsuit claiming it misled consumers who were disappointed the Halloween-themed Reese's peanut butter candies they bought lacked the decorative details shown on the labels.】

item.title: MercadoLibre 推出新的 B2B 部门，以开拓企业市场
item.description: 拉丁美洲最大的电子商务平台 MercadoLibre 周一宣布推出一个新的企业对企业（B2B）部门，以企业客户为目标，力图拓展传统消费市场以外的市场。【原文：Latin America's largest e-commerce platform MercadoLibre announced on Monday the launch of a new business-to-business (B2B) unit, targeting corporate clients as it seeks to expand beyond its traditional consumer market.】

item.title: Vanguard 看涨美国信贷，尽管关税风险依然存在
item.description: 美国顶级资产管理公司先锋（Vanguard）看好公司债券，尽管其估值较高，而且它预计关税将继续对美国经济和通胀前景构成风险，但这些不利因素可能会被美联储的进一步降息所抵消。【原文：Top U.S. asset manager Vanguard is bullish on corporate bonds despite high valuations, and while it expects tariffs will continue to be a risk for the U.S. economic and inflation outlook, those headwinds could be offset by further Federal Reserve interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 巴西监管机构认为巴西航空工业公司飞行出租车认证将于 2027 年实现
item.description: 巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）的电动飞机可能在2027年获得认证，但巴西航空监管机构的新任主席告诉路透社记者，他希望能提前一年达到这一里程碑。【原文：Brazil's Embraer could get certification of its electric aircraft in 2027, but the new president of the country's aviation regulator told Reuters he would like to hit that milestone a year earlier.】

item.title: 美国最大的铁路工会支持联合太平洋公司与诺福克南方公司在达成就业协议后合并
item.description: 美国最大的铁路工会 SMART 周一表示，在为其会员争取到工作保护保障后，将支持联合太平洋公司与诺福克南方公司价值 850 亿美元的合并计划。【原文：The United States' largest railroad union, SMART, said on Monday it would back Union Pacific's proposed $85 billion merger with Norfolk Southern after securing job protection guarantees for its members.】

item.title: 英国和美国将畅通资本市场准入与加密货币合作渠道
item.description: 英国财政部周一表示，英美两国政府将成立一个机构，为寻求进入大西洋两岸资本市场的企业减少繁文缛节，并加强在加密资产方面的合作。【原文：The governments of Britain and the United States will set up a body to reduce red tape for firms seeking to access capital markets on both sides of the Atlantic and improve cooperation on crypto assets, Britain's finance ministry said on Monday.】

item.title: 精神航空公司准备解雇 1800 名空乘人员
item.description: 精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）周一表示，在一年内第二次申请破产后，该公司准备从 12 月 1 日起解雇 1800 名空乘人员。【原文：Spirit Airlines said on Monday it is preparing to furlough 1,800 flight attendants effective December 1, after filing for its second bankruptcy in a year, as the low budget carrier grapples with dwindling cash and mounting losses.】

item.title: Magnum 冰淇淋公司将使用 NotCo 人工智能技术生产新产品
item.description: 联合利华的 Magnum 冰淇淋业务将于 11 月公开上市，该公司计划利用智利初创公司 NotCo 的人工智能技术重新配置产品并创造新产品。【原文：Unilever's Magnum ice cream business, set to publicly list in November, plans to use Chilean start-up NotCo's artificial intelligence to reformulate products and create new ones.】

item.title: 网络专家称，机场混乱凸显高调勒索软件攻击增多
item.description: 网络安全专家说，网络犯罪分子正在冒更大的风险，通过攻击知名度高的目标来获得更大的回报，并提高他们在网络上的声誉，此前，周末的一次黑客攻击导致欧洲各地机场的值机系统瘫痪，数千名乘客滞留。【原文：Cybercriminals are taking greater risks by hitting high-profile targets to get bigger payoffs and boost their online reputational clout, cybersecurity experts said, after a weekend hack crippled airport check-in systems across Europe and stranded thousands of passengers.】

item.title: 英伟达将向 OpenAI 投资 1000 亿美元
item.description: 芯片制造商英伟达（Nvidia）周一表示，根据一项新协议，双方计划向人工智能初创公司OpenAI投资高达1000亿美元。【原文：Chipmaker Nvidia plans to invest up to $100 billion in artificial intelligence startup OpenAI under a new agreement, the companies said on Monday, as competition intensifies among technology giants to secure access to energy and chips needed for AI growth.】

item.title: 关于甲骨文公司联席首席执行官克雷-马古埃克和迈克-西西利亚的五个事实
item.description: 甲骨文公司周一任命内部人士克雷-马古尔克（Clay Magouyrk）和迈克-西西利亚（Mike Sicilia）为联席首席执行官，接替执掌这家云服务提供商长达11年之久的萨夫拉-卡茨（Safra Catz）。【原文：Oracle named insiders Clay Magouyrk and Mike Sicilia as co-CEOs on Monday, replacing Safra Catz, who was at the helm of the cloud services provider for 11 years.】

item.title: 更多公司采用联合首席执行官结构
item.description: 企业软件制造商甲骨文公司（Oracle）周一任命公司内部人士克雷-马古尔克（Clay Magouyrk）和迈克-西西利亚（Mike Sicilia）为联席首席执行官，接替执掌公司11年后被任命为董事会副主席的萨夫拉-卡茨（Safra Catz）。【原文：Enterprise software maker Oracle on Monday named insiders Clay Magouyrk and Mike Sicilia as co-CEOs, replacing Safra Catz, who was named vice chair of the board after 11 years at the helm.】

item.title: 米兰：中性利率正在下降，美联储需要适应它
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）周一表示，移民、税收和监管政策的变化将推动美国基本利率的下降，并使当前的货币政策过于严格，无法满足经济将通胀率维持在美联储 2% 目标的需要。【原文：Changes in immigration, tax and regulatory policies are set to drive down underlying interest rates in the U.S., and make current monetary policy far too restrictive for what the economy needs to keep inflation at the Fed's 2% target, Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said on Monday.】

item.title: 埃克森公司为圭亚那 Hammerhead 项目投资开绿灯
item.description: 埃克森美孚周一表示，该公司批准了其在圭亚那的第七个开发项目 "锤头"（Hammerhead）的投资决定，该项目预计将于 2029 年开始油气生产。【原文：Exxon Mobil said on Monday that it greenlit the investment decision for its seventh development project in Guyana called Hammerhead, which is expected to begin oil and gas production in 2029.】

item.title: 卢特尼克称美国与哈萨克斯坦达成 40 亿美元机车交易
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周一宣布，美国和哈萨克斯坦已达成一项价值 40 亿美元的机车协议。【原文：The United States and Kazakhstan have reached a $4 billion locomotive agreement, Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick announced on Monday.】

item.title: 美国银行任命 Iles 和 Poensgen 领导欧洲、中东和非洲地区的交易工作
item.description: 根据路透社周一看到的一份备忘录，美国银行已任命 Geoff Iles 和 Lukas Poensgen 为其欧洲、中东和非洲并购业务的联席主管。【原文：Bank of America has appointed Geoff Iles and Lukas Poensgen as the co-heads of its mergers and acquisitions business in Europe, the Middle East and Africa, according to a memo seen by Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 独家报道乌克兰铁路公司计划提高运费以解决债务问题
item.description: 乌克兰国有铁路公司首席执行官 Oleksandr Pertsovskyi 在接受采访时表示，该公司已经制定了一项复苏计划，其中包括提高运费，以帮助控制其债务，应对俄罗斯愈演愈烈的攻击和货物交付量的下降。【原文：State-owned Ukrainian Railways has prepared a recovery plan that includes raising freight tariffs to help control its debt amid intensified Russian attacks and falling cargo deliveries, CEO Oleksandr Pertsovskyi said in an interview.】

item.title: 美国贝森特承诺提供支持后阿根廷市场飙升
item.description: 阿根廷金融资产周一反弹，在美国交易的股票上涨超过 10%，国际美元债券上涨超过 6 美分，比索在华盛顿表示美国支持阿根廷政府的 "所有选项都摆在桌面上 "后反弹。【原文：Argentine financial assets rallied on Monday, with U.S.-traded stocks up over 10%, international dollar bonds up more than 6 cents and the peso rallying after Washington said "all options are on the table" for the U.S. to support Argentina's government.】

item.title: Office Depot 母公司将被 Atlas Holdings 以 10 亿美元收购
item.description: 拥有办公用品零售商 Office Depot 和 OfficeMax 的 ODP 公司周一表示，同意被 Atlas Holdings 的关联公司以约 10 亿美元的价格私有化。【原文：The ODP Corporation , which owns office supply retailers Office Depot and OfficeMax, agreed to be taken private by an affiliate of Atlas Holdings for approximately $1 billion, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 商业银行集团寻求在美国罕见的银行首次公开募股中融资最多 1.04 亿美元
item.description: 商业银行集团（Commercial Bancgroup）周一表示，它计划通过首次公开募股筹集最多 1.04 亿美元，这将是美国银行罕见的一次上市。【原文：Commercial Bancgroup said on Monday it plans to raise up to $104 million through an initial public offering, in what would be a rare listing by a U.S. bank.】

item.title: 特朗普将签署命令，宣布 TikTok 交易符合 2024 年法律要求
item.description: 一位白宫官员周一表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统将在本周晚些时候签署一项行政命令，宣布将 TikTok 的美国业务从其中国所有者 Bytedance 手中剥离的交易符合 2024 年法律规定的要求。【原文：President Donald Trump will sign an executive order later this week that declares that a deal to divest TikTok's U.S. operations from its Chinese owner Bytedance will meet requirements set out in a 2024 law, a White House official said on Monday.】

item.title: 拉马斯瓦米支持的 Strive 公司将以 13 亿美元收购塞姆勒公司，全部为股票交易，增加比特币持有量
item.description: Strive 公司周一表示，它将通过一项全股票交易收购 Semler Scientific 公司，交易价值约为 13.4 亿美元，这家由前美国共和党总统候选人维韦克-拉马斯瓦米（Vivek Ramaswamy）支持的比特币财政公司正着手扩大其加密货币持有量。【原文：Strive said on Monday it will acquire Semler Scientific in an all-stock deal valued at about $1.34 billion, as the bitcoin-treasury company backed by former Republican U.S. presidential candidate Vivek Ramaswamy moves to expand its cryptocurrency holdings.】

item.title: 美联储穆萨莱姆称进一步降息空间有限
item.description: 圣路易斯联储主席阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆周一表示，他支持在上周的联储会议上降息，作为保护就业市场的预防措施，但他表示，鉴于通胀率高于联储2%的目标，进一步降息的空间可能 "有限"。【原文：St. Louis Federal Reserve President Alberto Musalem said on Monday he supported the rate cut at last week's Fed meeting as a precautionary move to protect the job market, but said there may be "limited room" for further reductions given inflation above the Fed's 2% target.】

item.title: 俄罗斯在西方被冻结的资产有哪些？
item.description: 2022 年俄罗斯全面入侵乌克兰后，美国及其盟国禁止与俄罗斯中央银行和财政部进行交易，自此欧盟冻结了价值高达 2500 亿美元的俄罗斯资产。【原文：As much as $250 billion worth of Russian assets have been frozen in the European Union since the U.S. and its allies prohibited transactions with Russia's central bank and finance ministry following Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine in 2022.】

item.title: 巴西 Cosan 公司表示，增资 100 亿美元是为了减轻债务，而不是为 Raizen 公司提供资金
item.description: 巴西企业集团 Cosan 的一位高管周一表示，该公司计划通过公开募股筹集 100 亿雷亚尔（约合 19 亿美元）的资金，但这些资金将仅用于减轻公司债务，并补充说，这些资金将不会用于帮助其陷入困境的与石油巨头壳牌的合资企业。【原文：Brazilian conglomerate Cosan's plans to raise up to 10 billion reais ($1.9 billion) through public offerings will go only to alleviating the company's debt, a top executive said on Monday, adding none of the funds would go to helping its embattled joint venture with oil giant Shell .】
